# The `BatchAAResults` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is a wrapper over an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a>, and it is intended to be used only when there are no IR changes inbetween queries. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::BatchAAResults</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class is a wrapper over an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a>, and it is intended to be used only when there are no IR changes inbetween queries.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults">BatchAAResults</a> is reusing the same <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a></code> to preserve the state across queries, esentially making <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> work in &quot;batch mode&quot;. The internal state cannot be cleared, so to go &quot;out-of-batch-mode&quot;, the user must either use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a>, or create a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults">BatchAAResults</a>.

Definition at line 630 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
